title: Average attendance in the National Football League 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average attendance. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Average attendance, of value 69487.0 was reached at Year 2016
Minimum Average attendance about 66151.0 was reached at Year 2019
